auditorium

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class represents an auditorium wire message. Messages on the wire are of the form ([name] [host] [sequence] [datum]).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String type,
       HostPointer from,
       java.lang.String sequence,
       ASExpression datum)
        Parameters:
        type - Construct a message of this type. This should be one of "join", "join-reply", "discover", "discover-reply", and "announce".
        from - Construct a message as being from this host.
        sequence - Construct of a message that has this sequence number.
        datum - Construct a message that has this datum.

      • Message

        public Message(ASExpression message)
        throws IncorrectFormatException
        Construct a message from its s-expression format.
        Parameters:
        message - Construct a message from this s-expression
        Throws:
        IncorrectFormatException - This method throws if the s-expression given is not in the correct format: ([name] [host] [sequence] [datum]).
